mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN a.busno <> '501' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END AS sort,A.busno,A.wareid,SUM(A.wareqty - A.awaitqty) AS WAREQTY FROM dbo.u_store_C A ,dbo.c_zone B ,dbo.c_stall C ,dbo.c_org_busi D WHERE A.busno = B.busno AND C.zoneno = B.zoneno AND C.stalltype ='11' AND A.busno = D.busno AND (A.BUSNO = '501' OR D.orgtype = '20' OR D.orgtype = '20' ) GROUP BY A.BUSNO,A.WAREID
